title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.14 - Pharmacy services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.14 - Pharmacy services

State Regulations
A central pharmacy, located so that it is accessible to
receiving and distribution stations, shall be provided. Adequate space shall be
provided for the following: (a) dispensing and compounding; (b) active storeroom; (c) office and
library, as required by workload; and
(d) parenteral solution, where
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
712-1.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
